description: The AWS::MemoryDB::Multi Region Cluster resource creates an Amazon MemoryDB Multi Region Cluster.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key for the tag. May not be null.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key for the tag. May not be null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)(?!memorydb:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]{1,128}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.description: The tag's value. May be null.
Value.markdownDescription:
The tag's value. May be null.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)(?!memorydb:)[a-zA-Z0-9 _\.\/=+:\-@]{1,256}$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.description: The name of the Multi Region cluster. This value must be unique as it also serves as the multi region cluster identifier.
MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.markdownDescription:
The name of the Multi Region cluster. This value must be unique as it also serves as the multi region cluster identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: [a-z][a-z0-9\-]*  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.description: Description of the multi region cluster.
Description.markdownDescription:
Description of the multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

MultiRegionClusterName.description: The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by MemoryDB adding a prefix to MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.
MultiRegionClusterName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by MemoryDB adding a prefix to MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Status.description: The status of the multi region cluster. For example, Available, Updating, Creating.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the multi region cluster. For example, Available, Updating, Creating.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

NodeType.description: The compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the multi region cluster.
NodeType.markdownDescription:
The compute and memory capacity of the nodes in the multi region cluster.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

NumShards.description: The number of shards the multi region cluster will contain.
NumShards.markdownDescription:
The number of shards the multi region cluster will contain.

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

MultiRegionParameterGroupName.description: The name of the parameter group associated with the multi region cluster.
MultiRegionParameterGroupName.markdownDescription:
The name of the parameter group associated with the multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

TLSEnabled.description:
A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

You cannot modify the value of TransitEncryptionEnabled after the cluster is created. To enable in-transit encryption on a cluster you must set TransitEncryptionEnabled to true when you create a cluster.
TLSEnabled.markdownDescription:
A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

You cannot modify the value of TransitEncryptionEnabled after the cluster is created. To enable in-transit encryption on a cluster you must set TransitEncryptionEnabled to true when you create a cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: Replacement

ARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multi region cluster.
ARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Engine.description: The engine type used by the multi region cluster.
Engine.markdownDescription:
The engine type used by the multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

EngineVersion.description: The Redis engine version used by the multi region cluster.
EngineVersion.markdownDescription:
The Redis engine version used by the multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: Replacement

Tags.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this multi region cluster.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An array of key-value pairs to apply to this multi region cluster.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

UpdateStrategy.description: An enum string value that determines the update strategy for scaling. Possible values are 'COORDINATED' and 'UNCOORDINATED'. Default is 'COORDINATED'.
UpdateStrategy.markdownDescription:
An enum string value that determines the update strategy for scaling. Possible values are 'COORDINATED' and 'UNCOORDINATED'. Default is 'COORDINATED'.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: COORDINATED | UNCOORDINATED  
Update requires: No interruption

MultiRegionClusterName.description: The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by MemoryDB adding a prefix to MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.
MultiRegionClusterName.markdownDescription:
The name of the Global Datastore, it is generated by MemoryDB adding a prefix to MultiRegionClusterNameSuffix.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Status.description: The status of the multi region cluster. For example, Available, Updating, Creating.
Status.markdownDescription:
The status of the multi region cluster. For example, Available, Updating, Creating.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

ARN.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multi region cluster.
ARN.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multi region cluster.
